articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: In Pictures: Coronavirus scare in China
articles.description: China expands drastic travel restrictions to contain epidemic that has killed 56 people and infected nearly 2,000.
articles.content:
The coronavirus outbreak that began in the central Chinese city of Wuhan has killed 56 people in China and infected more than 2,000 globally, most of them in China.
The virus has caused alarm because it is still too early to know how dangerous it is and how … [+884 chars]

articles.author: Scott Heidler
articles.title: China cracks down on wildlife trade amid coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: Move is latest measure to make public safety a top priority in bid to contain virus.
articles.content:
The rising death toll and increasingly rapid spread of the new coronavirus has prompted China's President Xi Jinping to declare the outbreak a "grave" situation.
He has also said public safety is the government's top priority.

articles.title: China's National Health Commission news conference on coronavirus
articles.description: China's National Health Commission is providing an update on coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
Ma Xiaowei, China's Health Commission minister, addresses the news conference on the joint prevention and control of the outbreak of pneumonia caused by the novel coronavirus on January 26.

articles.title: Timeline: How China's new coronavirus spread
articles.description: The virus has killed 56 people in China and has infected nearly 2,000 around the world.
articles.content:
Chinese authorities have closed off almost 20 cities amid efforts to contain a new coronavirus that has killed more than 50 people in recent weeks, with cases confirmed in several countries in Asia and beyond.

articles.title: Hubei cities fearful of China virus as medical supplies run low
articles.description: Doctors say they have resorted to using raincoats and plastic bags as protection as officials call for more supplies.

articles.title: China virus death toll rises to 56, with nearly 2,000 infected
articles.description: China has curbed travel and stepped up screening to try and curb the spread of the virus which emerged in December.
articles.content:
China on Sunday expanded drastic travel restrictions to contain the spread of a new coronavirus that President Xi Jinping said posed a "grave" threat, as the death toll reached 56 and Shanghai reported its first fatality.
